short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn your Facebook group members into leads!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Get GroupLeads, now you can easily turn your Facebook group members into leads in your CRM with a direct integration to REI Software or Google Sheets. Then you can use Zapier to integrate with your favorite CRM.

You can also create templates and tags to manage your Facebook Messenger communications. Tag each person in your Messenger with a color coded tag and then send them a message from any templates you create.

Create and use templates to send messages to your contacts in Messenger.
